Your Node Our Tech  
Powerful Blockchain Infrastructure

Elevate your blockchain network with powerful dedicated nodes from Luganodes.
We provide globally distributed node services designed for stability, scale,
and speed.

![icon](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Fully managed

![icon](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Globally distributed

![icon](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

99.9% uptime

![icon](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Automatic deployment

Select Your Node as a Service

Luganodes offers institutional-grade white label staking node services to
allow any level of customization for staking across multiple blockchains.

Our white label staking service empowers users with a fully managed and secure
staking experience, backed by state-of-the-art infrastructure, appropriate
failover practices, and dedicated SRE teams.

Brand our nodes as your own and deploy without the hassle of managing your own
infrastructure. Enjoy seamless staking integration with our full suite of
staking services, including the Luganodes Terminal to monitor staking
operations in real-time and easily manage the staking rewards.

Suitable for financial institutions, venture capital, exchanges, and banks.

[Start staking](https://terminal.luganodes.com/login/)

AAA Rated Node Services

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Dedicated Node Solutions

Luganodes proudly offers users with their own dedicated validator or RPC
nodes. This guarantees that users have full unparalleled control over their
staking or blockchain application operations, maximising returns at any point
in time.

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Robust Node Infrastructure

Luganodes runs bare metal servers which are geographically distributed around
the world to ensure high availability and minimise the risk of downtime or
security breaches.

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Highest Standard Security

Our dedicated validator or RPC nodes are located at Tier IV data centres with
security and reliability marked the highest standard across global data
centres.

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Automatic Failover Practice

We adopt appropriate failover practices to ensure nodes are always running
smoothly. Our redundancy system is designed to automatically route traffic to
another node in the event of an issue with one node, with no disruption to the
existing operation.

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Dedicated SRE team

Our dedicated SRE team monitors nodes and reacts to any issues quickly. We use
Grafana, Prometheus, and in-house tools to monitor nodes to ensure nodes
maintain high uptime.

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Carbon Neutral Staking

Luganodes pursues proactive engagement with external counsels on local
regulations to ensure our staking services always follow compliance rules and
be responsible to the environment.

![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='385'%20width='538'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
